rules.natural: Either the equipment is functional at the monitoring station, or, if an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, then it is not the case that an ash cloud is forming at the crater.
Whenever satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, a thermal anomaly is detected by the satellite.
Provided that satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, it is not the case that a thermal anomaly is detected by the satellite.
Either satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.
Either gas emission is increasing at the fumarole, or, in the event that pressure is building in the magma chamber, an eruption is imminent at the volcano.
Under the condition that ground deformation is detected by the GPS sensor, it is not the case that gas emission is increasing at the fumarole.
If a helicopter is dispatched by the rescue team, then, should ground deformation not be detected by the GPS sensor, it is not the case that infrastructure is damaged on the access road.
In the event that a ground team is mobilized by the rescue team, if ground deformation is not detected by the GPS sensor, then infrastructure is not damaged on the access road.
Either a drone is launched for surveillance, or a helicopter is dispatched by the rescue team, or a ground team is mobilized by the rescue team.
If the eruption model is updated, then the seismic data is reanalyzed.
Whenever the seismic data is reanalyzed, the eruption timeline forecast is refined.

In the event that the safety procedure is reviewed, then, if it is not the case that refining the eruption timeline forecast implies the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate, it is not the case that a prediction error is acknowledged by the team lead.
Either the safety procedure is reviewed, or training is enhanced for the staff.

Provided that training is enhanced for the staff, if refining the eruption timeline forecast does not imply the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate, then a prediction error is not acknowledged by the team lead.
If the seismometer is active at the monitoring station, then either magma is rising in the magma chamber or, when an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, lava is not flowing in the lava river.
Either calibration is verified for the instruments, or, if the alert protocol is tested, a false alarm is recorded in the log system.
If the battery backup is active for the system, then either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.
Either the battery backup is active for the system, or the solar panel array is functional.

If communication is established with the control center, then, should it not be the case that the solar panel array being functional implies either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station, it is not the case that a power failure is logged by maintenance.

Under the condition that the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, either magma is rising in the magma chamber or, provided an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, lava is not flowing in the lava river.
If the satellite link is active at the antenna, then the radio signal is strong from the transmitter.
Provided that the radio signal is strong from the transmitter, monitoring data is transmitted.
In the event that ash fall is detected by the sensor network, it is not the case that an ash cloud is forming at the crater.
If the particle sensor is triggered for air quality, then ash fall is detected by the sensor network.
Whenever the gas analyzer is operating in the sampling unit, the spectrometer is functional in the analysis lab.
Provided that the spectrometer is functional in the analysis lab, then, in the event that an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, the particle sensor is triggered for air quality.
Either maintenance is overdue for the equipment, or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.
If inspection is completed by the technician, then it is not the case that maintenance is overdue for the equipment.
Either the volcanologist has been alerted as a researcher, or the geologist has been alerted as a technician.
If a replacement is ordered for the component, then repair is needed for the sensor unit.
Either the budget is approved for the project, or, if inspection is not completed by the technician, a replacement is ordered for the component.
Either funding is available for the research, or the budget is not approved for the project.
Provided that the geologist has been alerted as a technician, the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station.
If an emergency meeting is called by the response team, then the public alert is activated in the emergency system.
Whenever an emergency meeting is called by the response team, a warning is issued by the alert system.
If a warning is issued by the alert system, then evacuation is ordered for the village.
If it is not the case that refining the eruption timeline forecast implies the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate, then a prediction error is acknowledged by the team lead.
Provided that activating the public alert in the emergency system does not imply evacuation is ordered for the village, the alert protocol is tested.
In the event that activating the public alert in the emergency system does not imply evacuation is ordered for the village, it is not the case that a false alarm is recorded in the log system.
Under the condition that neither the seismometer is active at the monitoring station nor the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, the eruption model is updated.
If it is not the case that either the seismometer is active at the monitoring station or the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, then the seismometer is calibrated.

Provided that neither the seismometer is active at the monitoring station nor the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, it is not the case that the measurement is precise for magma pressure.
If it is not the case that calibrating the seismometer implies the measurement is precise for magma pressure, then there is an instrument malfunction at the monitoring station.

In the event that the solar panel array being functional does not imply either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station, then a power failure is logged by maintenance.
Provided that alerting the volcanologist as a researcher does not imply the seismometer is active at the monitoring station, an emergency meeting is called by the response team.
If ground deformation is not detected by the GPS sensor, then infrastructure is damaged on the access road.
Under the condition that communication is not established with the control center, the satellite link is active at the antenna.
Whenever communication is not established with the control center, it is not the case that monitoring data is transmitted.
In the event that an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, lava is flowing in the lava river.
If an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, then an ash cloud is forming at the crater.

(A11 ∨ (¬G → ¬A10)).natural: Either the equipment is functional at the monitoring station, or, if an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, then it is not the case that an ash cloud is forming at the crater.

(A12 → A13).natural: Whenever satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, a thermal anomaly is detected by the satellite.

(A12 → ¬A13).natural: Provided that satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, it is not the case that a thermal anomaly is detected by the satellite.

(A12 ∨ ¬A11).natural: Either satellite data is available from the orbit sensor, or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.

(A14 → G).natural: If pressure is building in the magma chamber, then an eruption is imminent at the volcano.

(A15 ∨ (A14 → G)).natural: Either gas emission is increasing at the fumarole, or, in the event that pressure is building in the magma chamber, an eruption is imminent at the volcano.

(A16 → ¬A15).natural: Under the condition that ground deformation is detected by the GPS sensor, it is not the case that gas emission is increasing at the fumarole.

(A18 → (¬A16 → ¬A17)).natural: If a helicopter is dispatched by the rescue team, then, should ground deformation not be detected by the GPS sensor, it is not the case that infrastructure is damaged on the access road.

(A18 ∨ A19).natural: Either a helicopter is dispatched by the rescue team, or a ground team is mobilized by the rescue team.

(A19 → (¬A16 → ¬A17)).natural: In the event that a ground team is mobilized by the rescue team, if ground deformation is not detected by the GPS sensor, then infrastructure is not damaged on the access road.

(A2 ∨ (¬G → ¬A1)).natural: Either magma is rising in the magma chamber, or, whenever an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, it is not the case that lava is flowing in the lava river.

(A20 ∨ (A18 ∨ A19)).natural: Either a drone is launched for surveillance, or a helicopter is dispatched by the rescue team, or a ground team is mobilized by the rescue team.

(A22 → A21).natural: Provided that the eruption model is updated, the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate.

(A22 → A23).natural: If the eruption model is updated, then the seismic data is reanalyzed.

(A23 → A21).natural: Under the condition that the seismic data is reanalyzed, the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate.

(A23 → A24).natural: Whenever the seismic data is reanalyzed, the eruption timeline forecast is refined.

(A24 → A21).natural: If the eruption timeline forecast is refined, then the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate.

(A26 → (¬(A24 → A21) → ¬A25)).natural: In the event that the safety procedure is reviewed, then, if it is not the case that refining the eruption timeline forecast implies the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate, it is not the case that a prediction error is acknowledged by the team lead.

(A26 ∨ A27).natural: Either the safety procedure is reviewed, or training is enhanced for the staff.

(A27 → (¬(A24 → A21) → ¬A25)).natural: Provided that training is enhanced for the staff, if refining the eruption timeline forecast does not imply the eruption prediction by the volcanologist is accurate, then a prediction error is not acknowledged by the team lead.

(A28 → A7).natural: Whenever the public alert is activated in the emergency system, evacuation is ordered for the village.

(A3 → (A2 ∨ (¬G → ¬A1))).natural: If the seismometer is active at the monitoring station, then either magma is rising in the magma chamber or, when an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, lava is not flowing in the lava river.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either the seismometer is active at the monitoring station, or the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station.

(A30 → A29).natural: Under the condition that the alert protocol is tested, a false alarm is recorded in the log system.

(A31 ∨ (A30 → A29)).natural: Either calibration is verified for the instruments, or, if the alert protocol is tested, a false alarm is recorded in the log system.

(A33 → A32).natural: Provided that the seismometer is calibrated, the measurement is precise for magma pressure.

(A35 ∨ ¬A11).natural: Either power is supplied by the generator, or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.

(A36 → (A35 ∨ ¬A11)).natural: If the battery backup is active for the system, then either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.

(A36 ∨ A37).natural: Either the battery backup is active for the system, or the solar panel array is functional.

(A37 → (A35 ∨ ¬A11)).natural: In the event that the solar panel array is functional, then either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station.

(A39 → (¬(A37 → (A35 ∨ ¬A11)) → ¬A38)).natural: If communication is established with the control center, then, should it not be the case that the solar panel array being functional implies either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station, it is not the case that a power failure is logged by maintenance.

(A4 → (A2 ∨ (¬G → ¬A1))).natural: Under the condition that the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, either magma is rising in the magma chamber or, provided an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, lava is not flowing in the lava river.

(A46 → (¬G → A44)).natural: Provided that the spectrometer is functional in the analysis lab, then, in the event that an eruption is not imminent at the volcano, the particle sensor is triggered for air quality.

(A48 → ¬A47).natural: If inspection is completed by the technician, then it is not the case that maintenance is overdue for the equipment.

(A6 → A4).natural: Provided that the geologist has been alerted as a technician, the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station.

(A8 → A7).natural: In the event that an emergency meeting is called by the response team, evacuation is ordered for the village.

(¬(A28 → A7) → ¬A29).natural: In the event that activating the public alert in the emergency system does not imply evacuation is ordered for the village, it is not the case that a false alarm is recorded in the log system.

(¬(A3 ∨ A4) → ¬A32).natural: Provided that neither the seismometer is active at the monitoring station nor the gas sensor is active at the monitoring station, it is not the case that the measurement is precise for magma pressure.

(¬(A37 → (A35 ∨ ¬A11)) → A38).natural: In the event that the solar panel array being functional does not imply either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station, then a power failure is logged by maintenance.

(¬(A37 → (A35 ∨ ¬A11)) → ¬A38).natural: Under the condition that the solar panel array being functional does not imply either power is supplied by the generator or the equipment is not functional at the monitoring station, it is not the case that a power failure is logged by maintenance.
